prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a sleek, humanoid shape and wields spoons as weapons.
I want a yellow Pokemon with mental powers and a mysterious aura, designed for battles.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a wizard, with a focus on telekinesis and psychic abilities.
Make a character that embodies intelligence and agility, showcasing unique psychic powers.
Imagine a Pokemon with a slender form and sharp features, exuding confidence and wisdom.
Design a creature that combines agility and brainpower, perfect for strategic combat scenarios.
Show me a Pokemon that can manipulate objects with its mind, featuring a bright yellow color scheme.
